docs.lead_paragraph: THE need of rebuilding our cities presents one of the greatest challenges to post-war America. If we meet it we shall have forged the strongest link in national prosperity, for no other project can rival its potentialities for widespread stimulation of production and employment.

headline.main: The Super-Block Instead of Slums; McGoldrick offers a plan for rebuilding our cities and reviving blighted areas. Super-Block for Slums Super-Block for Slums Super-Block for Slums
